title: Are all laptops made in China? - Quora

response.answer_text: I had one that was made in Taiwan before (think it was an older Gigabyte or MSI, can’t remember). Most of them are made in China (PRC) though. Even if they aren’t, usually the ‘made in’ sticker is based on place of assembly and not all the components’ origin. Most if not all of those components are going to be made in China… so basically, the answer is yes.

It is hard to say with absolute certainty but most laptops are made in China or at least south east Asia. Maybe there is some laptop that is really tied to one geographical location that is why I can’t really say if all laptops are made in China. But one thing is for certain, most laptops are made in China.
